llm_hosting.app¶

Flask + tiny local LLM standardizer with incremental JSONL CLI output.

llm_hosting.app._resolve_cli_path(raw_path, *, must_exist)[source]¶

Resolve a CLI path to a sanitized filename under src.

Directory components provided by users are ignored; only a safe basename is used.

Parameters:

  • raw_path (str) – User-provided input/output path argument.

  • must_exist (bool) – Whether the resolved path must already exist.

Returns:

Sanitized and resolved path under the allowed CLI root.

Return type:

pathlib.Path

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the provided name is invalid.

  • FileNotFoundError – If must_exist is true and the file is absent.

llm_hosting.app._read_lines(path)[source]¶

Read non-empty UTF-8 lines from a text file.

Parameters:

path (str) – File path to read.

Returns:

Stripped non-empty lines, or empty list if file missing.

Return type:

list[str]

llm_hosting.app._load_llm()[source]¶

Load and memoize the local llama.cpp model.

Returns:

Initialized llama.cpp model instance.

Return type:

llama_cpp.Llama

llm_hosting.app._split_fallback(text)[source]¶

Parse program/university with heuristics when model output is invalid.

Parameters:

text (str) – Raw text to parse.

Returns:

(program, university) tuple.

Return type:

tuple[str, str]

llm_hosting.app._best_match(name, candidates, cutoff=0.86)[source]¶

Return best fuzzy match from candidate list.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Input string to match.

  • candidates (list[str]) – Candidate canonical strings.

  • cutoff (float) – Similarity threshold in [0.0, 1.0].

Returns:

Best candidate or None if no match meets cutoff.

Return type:

str | None

llm_hosting.app._post_normalize_program(prog)[source]¶

Normalize a program string to canonical output format.

Parameters:

prog (str) – Raw or model-generated program text.

Returns:

Canonicalized program name.

Return type:

str

llm_hosting.app._post_normalize_university(uni)[source]¶

Normalize a university string to canonical output format.

Parameters:

uni (str) – Raw or model-generated university text.

Returns:

Canonicalized university name, or "Unknown".

Return type:

str

llm_hosting.app._call_llm(program_text, school_text)[source]¶

Call the model and return standardized fields.

Parameters:

  • program_text (str) – Program value from input row.

  • school_text (str) – University value from input row.

Returns:

Standardized program and university.

Return type:

dict[str, str]

llm_hosting.app._normalize_input(payload)[source]¶

Normalize accepted request payload formats into a row list.

Parameters:

payload (Any) – Raw request/CLI payload.

Returns:

List of row dictionaries.

Return type:

list[dict[str, Any]]

llm_hosting.app.health()[source]¶

Return service health status.

Returns:

JSON response containing {"ok": True}.

Return type:

flask.Response

llm_hosting.app.standardize()[source]¶

Standardize request rows and return enriched payloads.

Returns:

JSON response containing standardized rows.

Return type:

flask.Response

llm_hosting.app._cli_process_file(in_path, out_path, append, to_stdout)[source]¶

Process input JSON rows and emit JSONL output incrementally.

Parameters:

  • in_path (str) – Input JSON path.

  • out_path (str | None) – Destination JSONL path when not writing to stdout.

  • append (bool) – Whether to append to output file.

  • to_stdout (bool) – Whether to write JSONL lines to stdout.

Returns:

None.

Return type:

None
